name: @ch/testing
description: This repo will contain all the Companies House DemoBlaze Product Store testing related code.

scripts.test:reg: cross-env test_env=test playwright test -c playwright.config.ts --project="Regression Tests"
scripts.test:reg:headed: cross-env test_env=test playwright test -c playwright.config.ts --project="Regression Tests" --headed
scripts.test:reg:debug: cross-env test_env=test playwright test -c playwright.config.ts --project="Regression Tests" --ui
scripts.allure:generate: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation allure generate reports/allure-results --clean -o reports/allure-report
scripts.regression: npm run test:reg && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
